job.title: Project Manager - Regulated markets
job.description:
Project Manager - Regulated markets:
Your influential mission. You will
Manage projects that ensure Playtech Casino is compliant across regulated markets, enabling safe and lawful gameplay for our players
Collect requirements for regulatory changes and translate them into clear tickets/emails for development teams and senior management
Host and attend weekly project and regulatory meetings, ensuring smooth communication across departments
Prepare evidence for audits and actively participate in them
Work closely with the Certification team, supporting their projects and initiatives
Components for success. You
Are familiar with both Agile methodologies (Scrum) and Waterfall practices
Have previous experience in people management, with strong communication skills to coordinate across departments and manage information flows
Possess strong analytical thinking and decision-making abilities
Are fluent in English (Upper-Intermediate or higher)
Are independent, resilient, and highly organized, able to stay calm under pressure in a fastpaced environment
Know when to escalate issues to avoid breaches and ensure compliance
Are approachable and create a platform for teams to communicate effectively
You'll get extra points for
Experience with JIRA (recommended but not mandatory)
Broad understanding of project management tools and processes
Ability to mentor and support colleagues across different functions
HOW TO APPLY?
In addition to your CV, please add a brief motivation letter covering your goals, your current experience, or related fields and/or working in a project team.You can write it in the comment section at the end of the application page (under "your message to the hiring manager").
